sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词都含有"笨拙的"之意。
means: awkward ：侧重缺乏优雅、机敏和技巧。用于物时，指使用不便。
clumsy ：指人时，侧重行动笨拙；指物时，侧重制作粗陋或体积、重量过大而呈现笨重。

sentence.Network_en: The action seemed a clumsy attempt to topple the Janata Dal government.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一试图推翻人民党政府的行动似乎缺乏策略。

sentence.Network_en: He is still smarting over criticism of his victorious but clumsy performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还在为别人批评他尽管最终胜出但表现笨拙感到闷闷不乐。

sentence.Network_en: It was a clumsy looking aeroplane.

考博词汇下载（10000词汇完整版） - 豆丁网 ... clump n． 丛； 簇； 群； 细菌凝块 clumsy a． 笨拙的， 愚笨的 clumsy n． 串， 簇…
游荡的是笨笨（Clumsy）不是惰惰 Lazy Smurf的中文翻译才是惰惰~看到有人怀疑蓝宝宝是蓝妹妹或者小筛子的私生子…… 看来有必 …

list.abs: 现代大学英语精读第一册Unit09-英语听力... ... Cambridge 剑桥（英国著名大学） clumsiness 行动笨拙 comfort 安慰.
beast... ... [the Beast ]【 宗】反对基督的人 Clumsy beast! 笨拙的畜生！ Stop goading the poor beast! 别再驱赶那可怜的动物了！.
爱哭鬼（clumsy girl）：生活中总有很多不顺心，有时哭泣是种很好的发泄，你是不是已经受够这个软弱的自己？爱哭鬼会抓住你内心 …
triggered solution 暗示引发解决方法clumsy children 笨拙儿童cluster 群集

means.word_mean: 笨拙的;愚笨的;不得体的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete clumse 'make numb, be numb', probably of Scandinavian origin and related to Swedish klumsig

entry.def: A  clumsy person moves or handles things in a careless, awkward way, often so that things are knocked over or broken.

example.ex: I'd never seen a clumsier, less coordinated boxer...
example.tran: 我从没见过更笨拙、动作更不协调的拳击手。

example.ex: Unfortunately, I was still very clumsy behind the wheel of the jeep.
example.tran: 令人遗憾的是我开起吉普来还是笨手笨脚。

entry.tran: (行为或措词)不得体的，拙劣的
entry.def: A clumsy action or statement is not skilful or is likely to upset people.

example.ex: The action seemed a clumsy attempt to topple the Janata Dal government...
example.tran: 这一试图推翻人民党政府的行动似乎缺乏策略。

example.ex: He denied the announcement was clumsy and insensitive.
example.tran: 他否认声明不得体、不近人情。

entry.tran: (设计或外表)粗糙的，难用的;设计欠佳的
entry.def: An object that is clumsy is not neat in design or appearance, and is often awkward to use.

example.ex: The keyboard is a large and clumsy instrument as far as portable computers are concerned...
example.tran: 就手提电脑而言，键盘就显得大而笨重了。

example.ex: It was a clumsy looking aeroplane.

means.word_mean: 1. lacking grace in movement or posture;

sentences.sentence: "a gawky lad with long ungainly legs"
"what an ungainly creature a giraffe is"
"heaved his unwieldy figure out of his chair"

means.word_mean: 2. not elegant or graceful in expression;

sentences.sentence: "if the rumor is true, can anything be more inept than to repeat it now?"

means.word_mean: 3. difficult to handle or manage especially because of shape;

sentences.sentence: "the cello, a rather ungainly instrument for a girl"

means.word_mean: 4. showing lack of skill or aptitude;

sentences.sentence: "his fumbling attempt to put up a shelf"

auth_sentence.content: Hence the clumsy efforts to introduce a new science.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hence the clumsy efforts to introduce a new science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence the clumsy efforts to introduce a new science.

auth_sentence.content: A clumsy contrivance to persuade me that I was unsuspected.
auth_sentence.res_content: A clumsy contrivance to persuade me that I was unsuspected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A clumsy contrivance to persuade me that I was unsuspected.

auth_sentence.content: From my clumsy fall I learned to be more cautious.
auth_sentence.res_content: From my clumsy fall I learned to be more cautious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From my clumsy fall I learned to be more cautious.

jushi.english: A clumsy dog knocked the cup over.
jushi.chinese: 一只笨拙的狗把杯子弄翻了。
她拙劣的演说使大家都很厌烦。
